TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Charles_Bradley, title = Charles_Bradley, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Bradley} }

S.FORM: Charles Bradley nalecuhan i Havre de Grace, Maryland, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Charles Bradley i 1981 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ku uwac atu silsil 23, namapili' tu nu Boston Celtics putiput. 5 bulad 16 demiad, 1959 a mihca, Charles Bradley, miunduay.

Charles Bradley nalecohan i Havre de Grace, Maryland, nano syobay kanas-mali miondoay no Amilika NBA nisakapot, pahanhanan to kawaw ayza. Charles Bradley i 1981 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ko owac ato silsil 23, namapili' to no Boston Celtics potipot. 5 bolad 16 demiad, 1959 a mihca, Charles Bradley, miondoay.
